thread.title: WATCH: No Messi, no problem as Neymar bags four goals for Barca
thread.title_full: WATCH: No Messi, no problem as Neymar bags four goals for Barca - CBSSports.com

author: Roger Gonzalez
title: WATCH: No Messi, no problem as Neymar bags four goals for Barca
text:
With Lionel Messi out with an injury, someone on Barcelona needed to step up. That would be Neymar, and he stepped up in a big way. In the match against Rayo Vallecano on Saturday, Neymar scored four goals in the first 70 minutes, two via penalty kicks. He also assisted Luis Suarez. 
Here are his goals. 
1.
2.

3.

4.

A fine performance from the Brazilian, who has put together one of his best performances in a Barca jersey.

The magical Neymar with an easy finish. (beIN Sports screengrab) 

Topics: SOCCER
